sn46.130:1: Sāvatthinidānaṁ. "Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, uddhambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni. Katamāni pañca? Rūparāgo, arūparāgo, māno, uddhaccaṁ, avijjā – imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañcuddhambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni. Imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṁ uddhambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvetabbā.
sn46.130:2: Ogho yogo upādānaṁ,Ganthā anusayena ca;Kāmaguṇā nīvaraṇā,Khandhā oruddhambhāgiyānīti.
